mapper.select: SELECT books.id as books_id, books.isbn_code as books_isbn_code, books.name as books_name, books.number as books_number, books.image_path as books_image_path, books.link as books_link, tags.id as tags_id, tags.name as tags_name, tags.sort_number as tags_sort_number, tags.tag_group_id as tags_tag_group_id, genres.id as genres_id, genres.name as genres_name, genres.sort_number as genres_sort_number, books.number - coalesce(book_count.lending_count, 0) as books_count FROM books LEFT JOIN book_genres ON books.id = book_genres.book_id LEFT JOIN genres ON book_genres.genre_id = genres.id LEFT JOIN book_tags ON books.id = book_tags.book_id LEFT JOIN tags ON book_tags.tag_id = tags.id LEFT JOIN tag_groups ON tags.tag_group_id = tag_groups.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT book_id, count(*) AS lending_count FROM lendings WHERE return_time IS NULL GROUP BY book_id) book_count ON books.id = book_count.book_id WHERE books.is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY books.id, tags.id, genres.id ;

SELECT books.id as books_id, books.isbn_code as books_isbn_code, books.name as books_name, books.number as books_number, books.image_path as books_image_path, books.link as books_link, tags.id as tags_id, tags.name as tags_name, tags.sort_number as tags_sort_number, tags.tag_group_id as tags_tag_group_id, genres.id as genres_id, genres.name as genres_name, genres.sort_number as genres_sort_number, books.number - count(lendings.lending_time) as books_count FROM books LEFT JOIN book_genres ON books.id = book_genres.book_id LEFT JOIN genres ON book_genres.genre_id = genres.id LEFT JOIN book_tags ON books.id = book_tags.book_id LEFT JOIN tags ON book_tags.tag_id = tags.id LEFT JOIN tag_groups ON tags.tag_group_id = tag_groups.id LEFT JOIN lendings ON books.id = lendings.book_id WHERE books.id = #{id} AND books.is_deleted = 0 AND lendings.return_time IS NULL GROUP BY books.id, tags.id, genres.id
SELECT id, name FROM genres WHERE is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY sort_number
SELECT id, name FROM tags WHERE tag_group_id = 1 ORDER BY sort_number
